html:
mighty man/man of war. Isaiah describes the Lord as a mighty man, a man of war, one who will go forth, stir up, cry, roar, and prevail against his enemies.

stir up jealousy. "Jealousy" here should read "zeal" (NIV) or "fury" (JB).

roar. The Lord will prevail against his enemies with the power of a lion (31:4).
